dreamHouse.title: Dream House
dreamHouse.description: A modern and visually appealing Apartment Renovation Landing Page with dynamic interactive elements, a rich gallery, and engaging features that make the user experience enjoyable. This fully functional and responsive project is part of my portfolio, demonstrating my skills in creating professional interfaces and attention to detail, though it is not a real commercial product.

bruden.title: Bruden
bruden.description: An elegant and responsive Clothing & Accessories E-commerce Store, featuring user registration, personal accounts, a product catalog, shopping cart, and a full admin panel. This fully functional project showcases my ability to implement complex e-commerce solutions for a seamless shopping experience. It is a portfolio project and not an actual online store.

travel.title: Travel
travel.description: A simple, user-friendly Tour Search Website designed to help users quickly find and explore exciting travel opportunities. With intuitive search filters, tour previews, and interactive elements, this fully functional and responsive project highlights my skills in building modern web applications. Part of my portfolio, it is fully operational but created for demonstration purposes.
